top.title: American citizen among those killed in Cuba boat shooting, US official says
top.summary: Cuba has accused those on board of planning "an infiltration with terrorist aims” and firing first.

top.title: US-Iran talks end after 'significant progress', mediator says
top.summary: The indirect negotiations in Geneva are seen as a last-ditch effort, but the chances of a nuclear agreement are unclear.

top.title: Pakistan strikes Afghan cities as cross-border attacks escalate
top.summary: The Afghan Taliban said it had responded to the Pakistani strikes, which targeted Afghan cities including Kabul and Kandahar.

top.title: 'I stopped engaging' due to Instagram, YouTube, woman tells landmark trial
top.summary: The young woman, who accuses Meta and Google of making addictive social media platforms, has been speaking in court.

top.title: Anthropic boss rejects Pentagon demand to drop AI safeguards
top.summary: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth previously threatened to remove the firm from the department's supply chain.

top.title: Burger King rolls out AI headsets that track employee 'friendliness'
top.summary: The fast-food chain is testing OpenAI-powered headsets that monitor staff interactions with customers.

title.#text: Anthropic refuses Pentagon’s new terms, standing firm on lethal autonomous weapons and mass surveillance
